values: Holding on to Your Faith in the Midst of Suffering: Q&AHolding on to Your Faith in the Midst of Suffering: Q&A

Calvinism does not teach that human responsibility is insignificant, but rather that humans do not have ultimate self-determination over their will, including their choice to be reconciled to God.
